segments.text: Yes . I'm OK . I just had a tumble . No big deal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . Can you please help me up ! I have trouble standing up by myself with the skis on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Is this your first time skiing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I tried skiing on grass before . Not very good at it , though .
segments.speaker: S1
